reference-wr.title: Sample Templates for Titanium Server
reference-wr.shortdesc: You can evaluate selected features of Heat using sample templates. The samples also demonstrate some Titanium Server extensions.

section.p: Sample Heat templates are included with the Titanium Server SDK. A brief description is provided for each sample. For more information about the SDK, refer to the Titanium Server Guest Software Development Kit documentation.
CGTS-5866 template path updatedThe samples are also copied to the Titanium Server controllers at system installation. They are packaged at /opt/deploy/cgcs_sdk/wrs-heat-templates-1.4.0.tgz.
